org.wonderly.config
Class DynamicConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.config.DynamicConfiguration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, Configuration, RemotelyModifiableConfigurationFile
public class DynamicConfiguration
extends Object
implements Configuration, RemotelyModifiableConfigurationFile

Uses a ConfigurationFile, or the passed Configuration as the readonly source of initial values and then provides a text based configuration extensibility using ConfigurationFile to parse passed configuration data.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly - gregg@wonderly.org
